title: We Would Love to Have You Here!  1 Bed 1 Bath Apartment
posting_body: ['Thanks for choosing Regal Towers', 'Property Address', '27500 Franklin Rd,', 'Southfield, MI, 48034', '<URL>', 'Move-in ready 1 bed 1 bath  units are available right now.', 'Settle into your new 640 square foot home in a friendly community with stunning amenities.', "With rents starting at $749, these units won't last.", 'Call us to schedule a tour or get started on an application today!', 'Floor Plan Details', 'Name: 1 Bedroom', '1 Bedrooms / 1 Bathrooms', '640-660 Sq.', 'Ft.', '$749.00 - $859.00', 'Community Amenities', 'Playground', 'Laundry Facilities', 'Swimming Pool', 'Tennis Court', 'Club House', 'Basketball Court', 'On-site Maintenance', '24-Hour emergency Maintenance', 'Full Equipped Fitness Center', 'Pets are Welcome (restrictions apply)', 'Public Transportation', 'BBQ Area', 'Gated Community', 'Property Contact', 'show contact info', 'David Capaul', 'ADA ACCESSIBLE', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY']
